rukus.text: Jinn logon ney kufur kiya aur Allah ki raah say roka Allah ney unn kay aemaal barbad ker diye

Aur jo log eman laye aur achay kaam kiye aur uss per bhi eman laye jo Muhammad (PBUH) per utari gaee hai aur darasal inn kay rab ki taraf say sacha (deen) bhi wohi hai Allah ney inn kay gunah door ker diye aur inn kay haal ki islaah kerdi
Yeh iss liye kay kafiron ney baatil ki pairwee ki aur momino ney uss din haq ki ittaba ki jo unn kay Allah ki taraf say hai Allah Taalaa logon ko unkay ehwaal issi tarah batata hai

To jabb kafiron say tumhari mud-bher ho to gardano per war maro jabb unko achi tarah kuchal dalo to abb khoob mazboot qaid-o-band say giriftar kero (phir ikhtiyar hai) kay khuwa ehsan rakh ker chor do ya fidya ley ker ta-waqt-e-kay laraee apnay hathyar rakh day. Yehi hukum hai aur agar Allah chahta to (khud) hi inn say badla ley leta lekin (uska mansha yeh hai) kay tum mein say aik ka imtehan doosray kay zariyey say ley ley jo log Allah ki raah mein shaheed ker diye jatay hain Allah Taalaa unkay aemaal hergiz zaya na keray ga
Unhen raah dikhaye ga aur unkay halaat ki islah kerday ga
Aur unhen uss jannat mein ley jaye ga jiss say unhen shanasa ker diya hai
Aey eman walo! Agar tum Allah kay (deen) ki madad kero gay to woh tumhari madad keray ga aur tumhen sabit qadam rakhay ga
Aur jo log kafir huye unhen halaki ho Allah unkay aemaal ghaarat kerday ga
Yeh iss liye kay woh Allah ki nazil kerdah cheez say na khush huye pus Allah Taalaa ney (bhi) unn kay aemaal zaya ker diye
Kiya inn logon nay zamin mein chal phir ker iss ka moaeena nahi kiya kay inn say pehlay kay logon ka nateeja kiya hua? Allah ney unhen halak ker diya aur kafiron kay liye iss tarah ki sazayen hain
Woh iss liye kay eman walon ka kaar saaz khud Allah Taalaa hai aur iss liye kay kafiron ka koi kaar saaz nahi
